title: As October 31 looms ever closer, what next for Brexit? Join our subscriber conference call to discuss this and more
text:
After three Prime Ministers, three Brexit deadlines, three meaningful votes and two proposed Brexit plans since the 2016 EU referendum, is the UK any closer to leaving the European Union? With just a handful of days remaining until the Hallowe’en Brexit deadline, has Donald Tusk’s warning to “not waste time” fallen on deaf ears?

On October 23, the Telegraph will hold an exclusive conference call for subscribers one week prior to the October Brexit deadline. To coincide with the one year anniversary of the Telegraph’s Brexit WhatsApp group, you can join the sharpest minds in Westminster to discuss the current Brexit state of play.

A new Prime Minister and Brexit negotiation team were ushered...
description: After three Prime Ministers, three Brexit deadlines, three meaningful votes and two proposed Brexit plans since the 2016 EU referendum, is the UK any closer to leaving the European Union?
